contract_details.description: Execute Phase 2 Batch 2A of the systematic cleanup mission: Utilities & Infrastructure Consolidation. Consolidate utility functions, standardize configuration management, improve infrastructure monitoring, and optimize file handling utilities across 36+ files.
contract_details.background: Phase 2 focuses on supporting infrastructure consolidation following the Phase 1 architectural foundation. This batch addresses utility consolidation that supports the optimized core and service layers.
objectives: Consolidate utility functions across src/utils/ and src/infrastructure/
Standardize configuration management patterns and tools
Create unified logging system with structured logging
Optimize file handling utilities and data processing
deliverables: Consolidated utilities module (≤5 primary utility modules)
Unified logging system with structured logging
Optimized file handling and data processing utilities
technical_requirements: Structured logging system with multiple output formats
File handling optimization and performance improvements
Health monitoring integration with existing systems
success_criteria: Utility module count reduced from 36+ to ≤5 modules
Unified logging system operational with structured output
Infrastructure monitoring integrated with health dashboard
File handling utilities optimized (≥20% performance improvement)

dependencies: Agent-2 onboarding completed and role understood
Utilities and infrastructure baseline analysis completed
resources_required: Access to src/utils/ and src/infrastructure/ directories
File handling and data processing libraries

contract_history.details: Phase 2 Batch 2A contract created for utilities and infrastructure consolidation
